description: Returns account-level settings related to OpenSearch Serverless.

nested_items.name: accountSettingsDetail
nested_items.description: OpenSearch Serverless-related details for the current account.

nested_items.name: capacityLimits
nested_items.description: The maximum capacity limits for all OpenSearch Serverless collections, in OpenSearch Compute Units (OCUs). These limits are used to scale your collections based on the current workload. For more information, see Managing capacity limits for Amazon OpenSearch Serverless.

nested_items.name: maxIndexingCapacityInOCU
nested_items.description: The maximum indexing capacity for collections.

nested_items.name: maxSearchCapacityInOCU
nested_items.description: The maximum search capacity for collections.
